title: Spotify Playlist Creation and Management Test
description: Verify that users can successfully create, edit, and manage playlists. The test should confirm that all playlist management features work as expected.
preConditions: User has a valid Spotify account and is logged in.
User has appropriate permissions to create and manage playlists.

steps.action: Navigate to the 'Your Library' section and click 'Create Playlist'.
steps.expectedResult: A new playlist is created and the playlist edit view is displayed.

steps.action: Enter playlist details (name, description) and save changes.
steps.expectedResult: The system saves the playlist details and displays the updated information.

steps.action: Search for songs and add them to the playlist.
steps.expectedResult: Songs are successfully added to the playlist and appear in the playlist view.

steps.action: Reorder songs in the playlist using drag and drop.
steps.expectedResult: Songs are reordered according to the user's actions and the new order is saved.
